answers.answer: I'm sorry to hear about your gallbladder attacks.  They can be very painful, as you know.  While I cannot comment on your specific situation, neither age, nor diabetes, nor atrial fibrillation are absolute contraindications to surgery.  You should be seen and evaluated by a cardiologist who can comment on your specific situation and make recommendations regarding your anti-coagulation medicine before any potential operation.
